title: Mark Zuckerberg promises $1,000 to Facebook users if they don't share their concerns.
subtitle: The Facebook Executive Director, Mark Zuckerberg, offered money to Facebook users who do not share social media tricks is in itself a sarcasm of social media tricks.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Mark Zuckerberg gives $1,000 to Facebook users who refrain from sharing tricks.
